评论详情: This is the perfect oversized hoodie. It’s got a heavy material that keeps you warm but it’s not overly bulky that it holds you down. It was a great value for the money, it was on sale when I purchased it. So chic and in style too!!! The zipper is kind of cheap, but I haven’t had any issues so far! Recommend!!!

评论概述: Worth it!! Quality & value, great oversized fit!
评论详情: Really great sweatshirt - perfect oversize fit! I'm approx 10/12 women's sizes and bought a Large in the heather grey. It has a nice "boyfriend" type oversized fit w/ good sleeve length, (can pull my hands up into sleeves easily, but the sleeves don't hang down over my hands either), overall length, (hits mid-butt on me - 5'5"), and perfect drop shoulder seams. Very soft inside & out and keeps me warm. No problems so far w/zipper that I've seen in other reviews. Happy w/my purchase & bought @ Black Friday deal price, so def worth $26 + change! The only minor suggestion would be that I wish they would make the pockets deeper - like the place where you put your hand in could be a smaller fit, extra loose for small hands and shallow for keeping your phone/might slip out easily.
I got a size XL The jacket is thick, very soft material, the hood is oversized which i like! The arm length could have been longer but overall good quality

评论概述: Very good material, super comfortable and soft and the price is very good
评论详情: I recently purchased a drawstring zip-up hoodie for the fall season, and I couldn't be happier with my choice! This hoodie fits perfectly, hugging my body in all the right places without feeling restrictive. The design is both stylish and functional, making it a versatile addition to my wardrobe.  One of the standout features of this hoodie is how incredibly soft it is on the inside. The fabric feels luxurious against the skin, providing warmth and comfort that is perfect for those chilly autumn days. Whether I'm lounging at home or out running errands, this hoodie keeps me cozy without sacrificing style.  In terms of price, I believe it offers great value for the quality of material used. It feels durable and well-made, which gives me confidence that it will last through many seasons to come.  Overall, I highly recommend this drawstring zip-up hoodie for anyone looking to stay warm and stylish this fall. It's a fantastic investment that combines comfort, quality, and a great fit!

I love this hoodie so much - it’s the perfect style for an oversized zip up sweatshirt. The fabric/material feels very durable and well-made, this thing does not feel cheap. Zippers can be kinda sticky when zipping up but overall great hoodie.
Shipping was quick and the quality of the is great. I bought an extra small and it is very large on my 5’4 frame. Definitly size down.

I needed a new hoodie for fall so I bought this one after reading the reviews. What I like about this hoodie is it's black, the material is thick and cozy. It keeps me warm on cooler days.  Overall, I’m delighted with this purchase and would definitely recommend it to anyone in need of a versatile hoodie. Whether you're heading out for a walk or just relaxing indoors, this hoodie has got you covered.

I’m a hoodie connoisseur and have a hoodie for all occasions. This is, by far, the best hoodie-for-cold-weather I’ve ever owned! It has the perfect thickness, it lays well on the body, is incredibly comfortable, and washes extremely well. It has quickly become my favorite Chicago winter hoodie!  HIGHLY recommend!

This is one of the items I was most skeptical about in terms of quality that I ordered but it's very accurate to the picture. The material feels thick and nice, it looks properly sewn and is higher quality than I was expecting so I said "no complaints" as I zipped it up and the zipper snagged twice..."I have a complaint....". Please add better zippers to this ya'll I know this is going to breakdown swiftly.
I like this zip up better than the sweatshirt. It’s very comfortable and decent quality material. I think this should hold up a long time. I would purchase another one.
Nice zip up hoodie. It is super soft and very thick. Great quality and exceeded my expectations. Will be buying another one for my teen.

This is the second one I purchased. This one for my sister in law. She loved hers too. These hoodies are super soft and comfy. They are also cuddly warm. I bought the yellow and light blue and the colors are beautiful. Stay true to your size, they are roomie. I have had my first one over a year and it still looks brand new. Nothing I don't  like about this " jacket"! In sale now, gotta get one!

This hoodie is everything I wanted and more! It’s so cozy and warm without being too bulky. The material is soft, and it doesn’t itch like some hoodies do. I also love the color and how it pairs with jeans or leggings. Perfect for layering in cooler weather. I’ve worn it several times already, and it’s quickly become one of my favorites.
fits great
Def oversized. Both of my daughters have this jacket now. Super cute and thick! They wear them almost everyday.
My new go to! So warm, cuddly soft and perfect!

I like this sweatshirt. I am 5"6",170 lbs, and have those broader shoulders. I can get hard for tops to fit correctly no matter what type of top /jacket it is. I ordered a large since it was considered oversized. It fit perfectly....and I would have given it 5 stars but I have to wash it a few times and see how the color holds up. but for fit and comfort....I will be buying a few more colors.
My daughter hates a coat! I bought this so she has at least something to wear. It really nice quality and warm. She loves it and doesn't give me grief about wearing it.
Looks exactly as described. I got an xs and it’s a a little too big. The zipper is not good. It gets stuck and cannot zip up all the way. Ok for the price but the zipper needs fixed.

I got a large and it was huge. Ordered a small and it was perfect (maybe even a little too big still), BUT I washed it and it shrunk a lot! Too short now :( So, get your usual size - itll be too large when you try it on, but then itll shrink and be good.

I was very surprised at what high quality material this is made out of. It is heavier than most sweat jackets. It is very soft and seems to run a bit larger in size. I would recommend purchasing, although the price is higher, I feel it is worth it.
Love this! True to size and worth the money spent.
It feels really warm ready for winter
I’m usually an xl in women’s tops (38DD) but I got this in a large since it’s oversized. It was still too big. It actually fits my husband who wears an XL.
Great sweatshirt. Does run quite large. Got a medium and there is plenty of room,
very good quality considering the price the only downside is the zipper is somewhat stubborn sometimes but all around good quality for the price
It’s actually very good quality, I didn’t expect thats
A nice thick warm
Love the vibrant color.  The only problem is my granddaughter loves it too.  So, it’s now hers. 🤣

I ordered this to wear on the weekends with jeans!  It is an ADORABLE color, BUT I DO NOT like the fact that it needs to be hand washed. I wear it to work sometimes but HOPE I don't get it too dirty.  I am am elementary school teacher.  This jacket is a pretty heavy material and fits oversized. Depending on the weather- it can be worn with a tank top under, or a think long sleeve top.  I get many compliments on the color of it.  I ordered a M and it is big on me - but I wanted it oversized  I am 5'2. 127 lbs

评论概述: High quality very thick feels expensive
评论详情: 145lbs 5’4 38D size large -UPDATE: couldn’t get the zipper to work when I wore this in the rain :( it’s so thick and warm, I could’ve gotten a medium but it’ll be more comfortable if I’m wearing a sweater underneath (although I would get way too hot) I’m keeping this even tho I live in a warm state. It’s so soft and cozy I hope it doesn’t attract lint or cat hair. Will update if it does.

评论概述: So soft and cozy, oversized fit overall
评论详情: Absolutely love how soft this hoodie is. I’ve been looking for a cute and versatile full zip option, and this is it! I ordered my typical size - it fits a little on the looser side, which is what I wanted. I know a lot of people mentioned issues with the zipper - it’s a little hard to get started, but mine works just fine. Here are a few more of my thoughts after wearing this one a few times:  Pros - extremely soft, slightly oversized fit without being too baggy, pockets are pretty big but not bulky, looks good zipped or unzipped, wears well with jeans or leggings  Cons - the inner lining behind the zipper is really large and makes it lay a little bit funky (you can kind of see in the picture with the zipper open), falls off the shoulder when zipped (but it’s actually kind of cute and could be considered a pro too lol), zipper is a little hard to get started  I haven’t washed this one yet, so we’ll see how it holds up! Overall, I think I’ve worn this for about three days straight since I got it. Definitely recommend!  Update: I didn’t have any issues when I ran this through the washer. I did also air dry it because I didn’t want it to shrink or lose any of the softness. I think running it through the washer might be where you see shedding so if you end up doing that, just be advised!

It’s oversized which I like so a small worked for me. Super soft on the inside and great quality for the price. Looks super cute and it’s versatile with any outfit. I haven’t noticed that it shrinks much when I dry it but I dry it on a lower heat! 10/10 will be buying every color
Great quality for the price and is very thick and warm as well as stylish.

评论概述: Very soft, but you need to break it in a little
评论详情: I’m 5’2, 225lbs, and ordered XL. At first, this felt very synthetic and just off, truthfully. However, the thickness was nice, fit was good, and generally I liked how it looked. After wearing it a lot, the texture softened and it feels more like genuine cotton. I will say, the only thing I don’t like is that the zipper sticks sometimes, more than my other zip hoodies. Overall, for the price it’s very warm and very good. (Please excuse my very dirty mirror in the photo, the hoodie is pure black and there’s nothing visually wrong with it)

I love this jacket it’s big and keeps you warm. I got it in a large wish I could have got it in a xlarge because I like my hoodies to be a lil longer but it’s fine. I’m 5’5 and 146 lbs if that helps . Good quality will be buying more in different colors!

Sizes are true.  Material thick and soft.  I always wash new clothes before wearing them.  Fabric softener cleared out the initial stiffness when received.  It also washed quite nicely.Some folks complained about the zippers sticking.  I used some candle wax on the zipper after it dried and it works just fine.Good price, fast delivery.
This zip up jacket is great for everyday use. It's lightweight, doesn't get fuzzy or fade from washing and it's very warm.
Great thick jacket warm and the size was perfect

评论概述: Comfy and warm with great quality
评论详情: I bought 2, one for me and one for dear friend for cold wet weather at the beach. The warmth was instant and the softness made the wet, cold weather almost disappear. I actually looked forward to being able to wear it!
This is super thick fit perfect.

I ordered the rust color in a small. Absolutely LOVED the feel and thickness of this jacket - definitely felt cozy. However, I returned/exchanged it because the color looked orange, not rust.  The second one/replacement that arrived didn't have the soft feel like the first one (odd - almost as if it had been used), the color was again orange, not rust. The band on the second jacket was a noticeably different color too. Therefore, it is going back.  But, I'm going to try to buy another color (when they go on sale again), and hope that I receive the quality of the first jacket (also hopefully the color will be more accurate). I really did like the fit and feel of the first jacket.  They run large. I wear between a small and medium, bought the small with lots of room.  So maybe this is a hit and miss jacket? Again, I only returned the first one because the color was much different than the pictured jacket - but the quality on that one was COZZZZZZY. That is why I'm willing to try again.  I'm keeping it at four stars because I'm on the fence....when I reorder, I'll update.

I loved this sweatshirt so much that after I received it.. I bought another one in a different color! So happy and pleased with this purchase. I'll probably order again in other colors. -- ** I am curious to know if you sell sweatpants to match in this same comfortable material???
Sleeves were short and the interface lining  doesn’t lay flat.  Not comfortable.

Maybe I’ll go back and add a pic, but this hoodie is AWESOME! It is lined with fleece, and is a bit thicker, but not as thick as some reviews say. It will keep you warm so it’s whatever on that. The make is so NICE. It sits on the waist so if you want a dropped waist look, go bigger. The fabric around the cuffs puffs out, and has a decent sized hood and makes it looks fitted but loose.(it’s so cute!) I went down a size like the reviews say and I can still fit layers underneath and not look bulked up so that’s a plus! It’s still a loose fit, but not bulky. ONE TINY THING….the sleeves. I usually have this problem so maybe it’s me, but the sleeves are a pinch too short. Nothing noticeable… maybe like a quarter of an inch too short. I think I have longer arms, hence a me problem. I love this hoodie I got it for work and might get another one in a different color just to wear. Happy shopping! Good quality! The hoodies I wear with this nice material usually cost $100+ so they did a fantastic job.
Love the hoodie. It is heavy and gives one room. I use it on the cool autumn mornings and it keeps me warm.

评论概述: Teenage daughter is crazy for this!
评论详情: My 15y/o loves this. She followed the size guideline at my insistence. She wanted to buy a med for (some) roominess. After reading reviews and considering size guidelines I talked her into a small. She loves the fit..u would think it's a medium the way it fits her but she doesnt have to sacrifice the length. (She likes how my mediums fit(the room they give her), but they r a little too long for her, I'm 3" taller). Shes 5'4", 110 lbs, small framed through the shoulders (I would call her petite build, and 5'4"). The ONLY consideration is the color. She ordered red. The red on our monitor appeared to be a brick red. We got a bright true red (tomato red). But she kept it due to fit, SOFTNESS!!, and mid-weight to thick(ish). Her real reason to buy was due to thickish weight...tired of buying these flimsy jackets that look cute but have ZERO warmth and/or softness. Shes all into Cozy!

评论概述: Not sure what is up with the Black Grey hoodie
评论详情: I love these hoodies in general and have 6 colors. My favorite color wise is the black grey however, my first one, the zipper broke with in the 2nd month. I went ahead and order another one and this time, the zipper broke within the first month.  All my other ones I've had for over a year and the zippers are fine. Yes the zipper is cheaper and takes a little of getting used to zipping them different than other sweatshirts, but they still work. The black grey ones for some reason break.The sweatshirts are warm, soft on the inside and have a cute oversized look so I do recommend them in other colors
I’m cute and dressed for winter now.  It’s hard to find one that’s not too thin at a good price.  I also ordered one in white.
I like the sweatshirt but the zipper there’s something wrong with the zipper. It’s not pulling up smoothly it sticks big time so I’m just warning people when they buy this.

Absolutely love this hooded zip-up sweatshirt Great quality, doesn’t shrink, no fading of the color They are really nice and wash well Went and bought more in other colors and truly great quality and price

I cannot say enough about this hoodie. Have had it for a few months now and it’s my favorite thing.  It’s heavy. This is no light weight summer day hoodie. It’s warm and snuggly. And the inside is so soft.  The hood is huge. Enormous. You could use it as a tent almost. It’s so good for cold nights by a campfire or an early morning dog run.  It is oversized but not schlumpy. The lower shoulders, the subtle balloon sleeves, and the way it comes in at the waist but not in a way that restricts you… it’s great!  I wash in cold and hang dry because I want it to keep its softness.  I was looking at those $80 yoga hoodies but was nervous to buy one because of returns. This seems better to me in every way, including price. I have had no issue with the zipper or the strings and I’ve camped in this all summer.  I am 5’5” and 145 pounds and absolutely could have probably worn a small or a medium, but I got a Large so it would be oversized and cuddly. No regrets!

评论概述: Make sure to get a sizer bigger if you life the super oversized look
评论详情: This jacket is thick, oversized and soft! Just how I like it!
I love the sweatshirt, but the zipper is not great. It's very difficult to zip up the sweatshirt. It gets stuck and I have to force it to zip up.
Love love love!!! Soft, really black ..got a large, I am 170lbs and it is perfect for over my scrubs

I like this. The only thing is that the white stained pretty easily but if you take good care of your clothes it should be fine. It is defiantly oversized and thick material. Super comfortable and have gotten lots of complements with it on.
Love it... very warm and thick
My daughter loves this but it needed about 5 washes to get the lint off. Still with black leggings, the lint leaves a trace. Otherwise good product for the cost!
I love the color, but the fabric is quite stiff and thick.  The hood doesn't want to lie flat on my back.  Still, I like it well enough to keep it and to wear it when the weather is cool enough.

It was for my 13yr old daughter (about 120, 5'3").  She got a large, It was oversized on her but she liked it that way.  I also wore it a few times and it fit me true to size.  I was surprised how thick this hoodie is, so it was warm for a girl who doesn't believe in wearing a coat, lol.  After 9 mos the zipper did break, but when you wear something EVERYDAY for 9 mos I suppose its inevitable.  She's getting another for Christmas and I'll probably get myself one too.  Recommend!

评论详情: Es súper grande y súper calientito

This jacket is so nice and well made.  The only dislike I have is I wish the color red was a darker red.  It's okay but it is more of an red orange. The color doesn't look like the picture which is the color I really wanted.  I am going to keep it because it looks so nice on and is so well made.  I also ordered the white one and I really like it and it is made just like the red one.  The material is heavy, strong and not cheap looking, something you don't fine that ofter now days.

Wear it in the fall and winter. Is very heavy and the appearance is very stylish. Due to it being big, when wearing it with a long sleeve I do not feel anything when it come to having long sleeves on.

Very nice hoodie and it’s a good price. Super soft and thick, has no appearance of being a low priced hoodie. I’m shears hesitant to but clothes online but this did not disappoint. The only reason I won’t give it a 5 star is the zipper could be better. It sometimes snags and you have to play with it to get it going. Sizing- 5’5”, 145lbs and bought the medium, which definitely is loose. Not quite oversized but if I wanted it to be a fitted look I would get a small. That being said, even though it’s loose, it’s not unflattering as the style and fabric has a really good hold & look.
The color of this jacket is like fire engine red. Looks burgundy in the picture..

评论概述: Sleeves are too short at recommended size, but the rest of the shape is oversized as expected.
评论详情: It's a great, heavy hoodie with a large hood and nice shape. The only con is short sleeve length. I bought a Medium even though I am more of a Small these days and the sleeves are like 2inches too short, so I would still recommend sizing up one or two sizes if that matters to you for comfort/warmth. The model is probably wearing a larger size.
It shrunk up. But it’s thick

Very comfy and cozy feel. Love how it feels on. It does run large so I would get your regular size and it still has the oversized look. For some reason the suggested size was large for me but I still got the medium and it’s plenty big enough for me. I got the Orange for Halloween  and it’s def pretty bright. Not so sure if I want it bc of that but that was just a personal choice about the color. I imagine the other colors are going to be pretty pigmented as well.
I love this sweater!! it fits me so well and is very thick and made of good, soft material!
i love it
Wished it came in an XXL for the oversized look. Material is heavy and good quality.
La talla es un poco grande pero de todas formas me encantó, el material estupendo.
Love the color
Perfect fit. Love the looseness. Soft material. Great product for the price.

评论概述: The Case of the Almost Perfect Hoodie
评论详情: I really wanted to love these hoodies, but sadly, I will not be keeping them. The GOOD: Very plush fabric, cozy, nicely over-sized, colors as depicted, decently made, and a perfect athleisure staple. THE BAD: Very cheap metal zipper that stalls, catches, and looks shoddy. One of the hoodies I purchased had a zipper with defective teeth, so I couldn't zip it all the way up. Adding to this, the hood is extremely pointy and sits at the top of your head. If you are trying to live that gnome life or give gnome vibes, this hoodie is a must. THE UGLY: Again, for the folks in the back: cheap zipper and pointy hood. I hope they revamp this hoodie one day, because those two minor adjustments could make it the PERFECT hoodie. For now, it's a no from me, dawg.

This is just as described.  The size runs a little bit big, I usually wear a Women's XL, but ordered a Large and it fits perfect.  I am 5'7" and 217 lbs.  heavy around the hips, but this fits perfectly.  First thing I did was wash it in the washer on gentle cycle, cold water, light wash - then put it in the dryer until dry on Ex Light - It did not shrink to my knowledge.  it fits perfect.  It is very soft and comfortable.  Appears to be very durable.  The zipper was a good solid metal and have no trouble zipping it up or down.  I will be ordering a couple more in different colors.  This is probably the best sweat jacket I've ever owned.  The pockets are deep enough to hold my phone and keys - don't have to worry too much about things falling out.

This is a nice quality, warm, and soft hoodie. I like it and I’ll keep it, but I wanted to post because it’s much, much heavier and thicker than I was expecting. It feels very heavy, it’s almost more like a jacket. This will be great for the cold weather coming up and great for winter, but keep in mind to anyone buying that this is heavier and warmer than a casual hoodie. It has some weight to it. It’s more for winter than a cooler summer day.
Looks great fits greay
Very comfy, great color, fits as expected!

I like the hoodie, it's very soft and comfy. I bought it as an all-purpose hoodie, but I'm using it similar to a robe, to put on when I get up in the morning, because it seems actually too bulky to wear all the time. I definitely could not put a jacket on over it because the sleeves are very loose fitting. The fit is extremely generous, best as your outermost layer. I'm 5' 7" and 125, and I ordered size medium. To me, it fits like a women's large or men's medium. I would order small next time. The zipper is metal and a little aggressive, like the zipper you would expect on outdoor gear. I might choose one with a non-metallic zipper for indoor leisure wear. If you plan to wear it outside raking leaves with gloves on, it's perfect.

I was looking for a nice white zip-up hoodie for the cooler days, I found this one. I originally got a size Small, which is a size down from my normal Medium. (I wear size M in just about everything). I knew this was oversized in fit, but it was HUGE, I returned for the XS, it fits better, but honestly, I could probably fit into a size XXS. These are LARGE, very roomy. I decided to keep the XS. It's not a bright white, soft white and relatively thick. It is very warm. I think this will be a great addition to my Fall/Winter wardrobe.

For me it runs large but I shrunk it by washing it on hot water and now it's perfect. Nice and thick. My favorite hoodie. Note product information is wrong.. it is made out of cotton and polyester and can be washed. I did wash mine and it came out great.. very soft Since my first purchase I have purchased 4 more. This time I bought my regular size and it’s still a bit big but I figure it will shrink in time. I own black, white, navy, and red. I always prewash my clothes but I will say be careful with the white, it filled the lint trap and put fuzzies everywhere. Unfortunately for me my next load was darks.

I really love that this hoodie is very cozy. It’s a little  bulky, but that’s really what I was looking for. But if you don’t want bulky cozy, then this probably isn’t the zip up for you. I wear it all the time-it’s to wear at home and it’s just a little chilly in the house or when it’s not too cold outside and it’s typical Fall weather, it’s very warm and comfortable running around doing errands.

The zipper is very stiff, difficult to zip up. The facing material inside is not attached to anything and flops out unless the sweatshirt is zipped up. Material is soft and comfortable, definately oversized, so order a size smaller. I would NOT purchase again.

I bought this hoodie because my niece had one and it looked super comfy. I love it. The color is bright, the material is thick and comfy. The zipper is a little stiff at times but for the most part, I would recommend this product. I have been major compliments on it too!
The sweater is nice and thick and soft. Only issue is the zipper is really hard to zip.
The quality of this jacket is nice, I ordered the rust color but it isn’t rust.. it’s a pinkish orange!
I have ordered these in every color and they have lasted years! None have shrunken in the wash, they have a little give, are super comfy, not to bulky, and didn't have a smell.
I would buy again. Soft and comfy.
The fabric is great and it’s very well made. My only minor complaint is the zipper. It’s a bit hard to zip; seems rough. A higher quality zipper would make it perfect! I’d still recommend it though.

I bought this for my daughter's 10th birthday. She absolutely loves it. She wears it every day and is so comfortable in it. It's not too thick but thick enough to keep her warm on cold days/ mornings. I'm going to have to buy her another one or two. They are a little pricy tho, so I'll see if they have something cheaper at Ross, Marshalls, the swap meet etc. But I would recommend anyone to get this jacket. I would love one myself lol
Better quality than I expected. Nice thick fabric and super comfortable! I will buy it in other colors !
This was surprisingly thick and soft. The color made it through two washes so far. I did not dry it because I did not want it to shrink. I am highly satisfied with this product, and I do sugggest.
Love this jacket.

I have bought many pullover sweatshirts from this brand. I absolutely love their oversized sweatshirts. I decided to try this zip up hoodie, and it's fine, but the zipper needs work. I wish mine was a bit more oversized, but my biggest complaint is that the zipper sticks and is tricky. It does not go up and down very smoothly. I already read this in the reviews, so I expected it, but now I am able to confirm. I am still going to wear it because I am obsessed with sweatshirts. It is soft and comfortable, so no complaints there.

This product is so spongy and comfy. It is very thick but also made it a breathable material. It is almost like lululemon but a quarter of the price. I really like the color and the product itself. I recommend if you looking for a more affordable nice hoodie.

评论概述: Color not as advertised, but comfy
评论详情: This sweatshirt is comfy and I was very pleasantly surprised to see how long the sleeves are! The pink though is not a true baby pink like it seems in the picture. Much more orange in there, like a pale coral color.

This is my favorite jacket. It’s warm and comfortable. One of my friends stained my 1st jacket so i bought another one. My one complaint is that on my second green jacket the zipper was kinda cheesy. It now won’t zip up and I had only worn it a few times. Other then that the jacket itself is great! The first tan one was perfect and the zipper still works almost a year later.

This is the best hoodie! I got a large because I like the oversized look and it really does well. You can wear it high and make it an off the shoulder crop hoodie or pull it down to cover the bloat. It is super duper soft and has the perfect amount of thickness which is great for winter. The quality of material and oversized style really makes this jacket so great. It’s cute and I love the color. Goes pairs well with jeans and leggings and if you’re really feeling loungy a nice baggy pair of joggers. Great with black, grays, blues, pinks, greens, and white.
